attributes.action: Honours should not be given to civil servants,MP'S and personalities
attributes.additional_details: People I know who have worked in either the tax  or vat office or civil service have automatically been awarded a gong for just doing their job like millions of other people around the country .this is wrong and demeans those awards for given to the likes of service personnel who are injured in action serving their country.
attributes.background: Lots of civil servants and MP'S and personalities get honours for just doing their job and not contributing to the wider community this is wrong and demeans the honours system.
